item.title: I tried Pandas' Sql Upsert
item.description: ## Introduction This is Miyano (@estie_mynfire) of estie CTO. Since estie builds real estate data from various resources, pandas is used for data shaping. for that reason Data created with pandas -> DataBase It is important to carry out this flow smoothly. Since there was only replace and append as it was, I had to do my best on the pandas side and then update it. (This is very troublesome)
